data.title: Where is the headquarters of the National Hockey League Players' Association (NHLPA)?
data.meta_description: Time to challenge yourself. Click here to answer this question and others on QuizzClub.com
data.meta_site_name: QuizzClub.com — The World's Largest collection of Quizzes, Trivia Questions, Personality Tests
data.text:
NHLPA is the labour union for the group of professional hockey players who are under Standard Player Contracts to the 32 member clubs in the National Hockey League (NHL) located in the United States and Canada.

Established in 1967, and with headquarters in Toronto, the NHLPA’s principal role is to represent the players of the National Hockey League and to guarantee that their rights as players are upheld.
